original_text: the name of the star is Wormwood. A third of the waters turned bitter, and many people died from the waters that had become bitter.
korean_text: 이 별 이름은 쓴 쑥이라 물의 삼분의 일이 쓴 쑥이 되매 그 물이 쓴 물이 되므로 많은 사람이 죽더라

sentences.original_text: the name of the star is Wormwood
A third of the waters turned bitter
from the waters that had become bitter
